sections.title: SCATTER
rules: Appears only on reels 2, 3, 4.
3 or more SCATTER symbols trigger 5 Free Games and Golden Mine Game.
Win more Free Games or other features in the Match 3 Golden Mine Game:
+ 2 Extra Free Games
+ 3 Extra Free Games
+ 5 Extra Free Games
Free games win multiplier - will multiply all wins during Free Games except cumulative part of Jackpot wins.
Easy retrigger - just 2 SCATTER symbols will retrigger the Free Games.
Random extra free games can be won during each pick.
5th and 10th Golden Mine Game trigger Super Free Games with guaranteed win multiplier.
20th Golden Mine Game trigger Grand Free Games with guaranteed win multiplier and easy retrigger.

sections.title: MINE CART
rules: MINE CART and MINE CART WILD symbols are present on all reels.
3 or more MINE CART and/or MINE CART WILD symbols trigger Quick Cash feature.

sections.title: WILD and MINE CART WILD
rules: Replaces all symbols except SCATTER, MINE CART and MINE CART WILD symbols.
Gold Mine is a 30 paylines slot.
All symbols pay from left to right starting with the leftmost reel.
Only highest win paid per line.
All paylines wins are multiplied by the bet per line.
Free Games start after the Golden Mine Game.
Landing 3 SCATTER symbols during the Free Games awards 5 additional Free Games.
Free Games can have a multiplier, which will multiply all wins during Free Games except Quick Cash wins.
Free Games can have an Easy retrigger feature: Landing 2 SCATTER symbols during the Free Games awards 3 additional Free Games.
Free Games start after the 5th and 10th Golden Mine Game.
Landing 3 SCATTER symbols during the Free Games awards 5 additional Free Games.
Free Games have a multiplier, which will multiply all wins during Free Games except Quick Cash wins.
Free Games start after the 20th Golden Mine Game.
Landing 3 SCATTER symbols during the Free Games awards 5 additional Free Games.
Free Games have a multiplier, which will multiply all wins during Free Games except Quick Cash wins.
Free Games have a guaranteed Easy retrigger feature: Landing 2 SCATTER symbols during the Free Games awards 3 additional Free Games.
